Title: The Day the World Went Away
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Andy Callahan, Melissa Scrivner-Love, Lucas O'Connor (executive story editor), Tony Camerino (story editor), Andy Callahan (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Finch's number comes up when a fatal error blows his cover identity and sets off a deadly series of escalating encounters with Samaritan's operatives.
